chapters.title: Santa's Workshop
chapters.narrative: Welcome to Santa's Workshop! The elves need your help organizing the toy pieces. Your first task is to solve a simple puzzle to unlock the workshop door. Good luck!

chapters.title: Elf Training
chapters.narrative: Great job! The workshop is open. Now the young elves need training. Complete more puzzles to help them learn the art of toy organization. Prove your skills!

chapters.title: Toy Assembly
chapters.narrative: The elves are learning! Now it's time for the real challenge - assembling the toys. These puzzles are getting trickier, but Santa believes in you!

chapters.title: Sleigh Loading
chapters.narrative: Excellent work! The toys are ready, but now we need to load them onto the sleigh. This requires precision and skill. Show Santa what you've learned!

chapters.title: Christmas Eve Delivery
chapters.narrative: This is it! The final challenge. Christmas Eve is here, and the sleigh must be perfectly organized for Santa's journey around the world. Can you master this ultimate puzzle?
